svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
December 17, 2022" date: "2022-12-17"
Eth News and Links
Shapella (Shanghai + Capella) upgrade
* Tim Beiko’s core devs update : details of Shanghai EIPs and planning for the
subsequent Cancun upgrade
Tim Beiko’s core devs update : details of Shanghai EIPs and planning for the subsequent
Cancun upgrade
* Latest consensus devs call video . Notes from Ben Edgington & Christine Kim :
Shapella testnet planned for next week, D-starname needed for next CL upgrade
Latest consensus devs call video . Notes from Ben Edgington & Christine Kim : Shapella
testnet planned for next week, D-starname needed for next CL upgrade
* Consensus-specs v1.3.0-alpha.2 : adds withdrawals sweep bounding, config changes,
clarifications & minor fixes
Consensus-specs v1.3.0-alpha.2 : adds withdrawals sweep bounding, config changes,
Cancun + D-starname upgrade
* EIP4844 implementers call video and notes : devnet 3 planned for next week
EIP4844 implementers call video and notes : devnet 3 planned for next week
* Run EIP4844 local devnet using Geth + Prysm
Run EIP4844 local devnet using Geth + Prysm
* EIP1153 transient storage explainer
EIP1153 transient storage explainer
Layer 1
* Lido plans to delegate listing of MEV-Boost relays to a committee
Lido plans to delegate listing of MEV-Boost relays to a committee
* Reconnaissance : proxy node using Reth client
Reconnaissance : proxy node using Reth client
* Vitalik’s EOF proposal to ban code introspection : automate code conversion to the
latest EVM version and make adding EVM features easier
Vitalik’s EOF proposal to ban code introspection : automate code conversion to the
Research
* Block vs slot auction Proposer-Builder Separation
Client releases
* Consensus Layer: Nimbus v22.11.1 : hotfix for missed block proposals when using
remote signers Prysm v3.2.0 : adds randao json & liveness endpoints and bug fixes
Consensus Layer:
* Nimbus v22.11.1 : hotfix for missed block proposals when using remote signers
Nimbus v22.11.1 : hotfix for missed block proposals when using remote signers
* Prysm v3.2.0 : adds randao json & liveness endpoints and bug fixes
Prysm v3.2.0 : adds randao json & liveness endpoints and bug fixes
* Execution Layer: Besu v22.10.3 : implement Eth/68, speed up modexp, Graalvm no longer
supported EthereumJS v0.6.6 : optimizations & fixes from Shandong (pre-Shanghai)
testnet Erigon v2.32.0 : bug fixes
Execution Layer:
* Besu v22.10.3 : implement Eth/68, speed up modexp, Graalvm no longer supported
Besu v22.10.3 : implement Eth/68, speed up modexp, Graalvm no longer supported
* EthereumJS v0.6.6 : optimizations & fixes from Shandong (pre-Shanghai) testnet
EthereumJS v0.6.6 : optimizations & fixes from Shandong (pre-Shanghai) testnet
* Erigon v2.32.0 : bug fixes
Erigon v2.32.0 : bug fixes
Layer 2
* Arbitrum griefing attack of bridge deemed unrealistic as no plans for third party
relayers
Arbitrum griefing attack of bridge deemed unrealistic as no plans for third party
* Scroll: bottlenecks in proof generation with options to accelerate
Scroll: bottlenecks in proof generation with options to accelerate
* Polygon zkEVM proving time 2.5 min on a $7 per hour AWS instance
Polygon zkEVM proving time 2.5 min on a $7 per hour AWS instance
* Consensys Vortex zk prover : 30 million gas block in 5 minutes on AWS hpc6a.48xlarge
Consensys Vortex zk prover : 30 million gas block in 5 minutes on AWS hpc6a.48xlarge
* zkSync v2 alpha delayed until Q2 2023
zkSync v2 alpha delayed until Q2 2023
EIPs/Standards
* EIP6120 : Universal token router
EIP6120 : Universal token router
* EIP6122 : Forkid checks based on timestamps
EIP6122 : Forkid checks based on timestamps
* EIP6123 : Smart derivative contract
EIP6123 : Smart derivative contract
* EIP6145 : Hashtag NFT collective royalty treasury
EIP6145 : Hashtag NFT collective royalty treasury
* EIP6147 : Guard of NFT/SBT, an extension of ERC721
EIP6147 : Guard of NFT/SBT, an extension of ERC721
* EIP6150 : Hierarchical NFTs
EIP6150 : Hierarchical NFTs
This newsletter is made possible thanks to SpeedRunEthereum !
Test your skills and learn how to build apps on Ethereum at SpeedRunEthereum.com .
Stuff for developers
* Sepolia testnet landing page: RPC, checkpoint sync, explorers & spec
Sepolia testnet landing page: RPC, checkpoint sync, explorers & spec
* Forge-std v1.2.0 (Foundry): speed up via-ir compilation, bound integers and cheat
codes for environment variable defaults, get file/folder metadata & to pause gas
metering
Forge-std v1.2.0 (Foundry): speed up via-ir compilation, bound integers and cheat codes
for environment variable defaults, get file/folder metadata & to pause gas metering
* Foundry fork testing using a specific block number in GitHub Actions can cache RPC
responses
Foundry fork testing using a specific block number in GitHub Actions can cache RPC
* Remix v0.29.0 : debugger shows gas usage in editor & variable value on hover,
multisig workspace template, UI in Simplified Chinese characters, formatting config and
remixd updated
Remix v0.29.0 : debugger shows gas usage in editor & variable value on hover, multisig
workspace template, UI in Simplified Chinese characters, formatting config and remixd
updated
* Otterscan v1.29.0 : optional beacon chain integration
Otterscan v1.29.0 : optional beacon chain integration
* Contract honeypots : review of common traps with examples
Contract honeypots : review of common traps with examples
* Auditing heuristics for common pitfalls
Auditing heuristics for common pitfalls
* Sol2uml v2.4.0 adds flattened diff of verified contracts
Sol2uml v2.4.0 adds flattened diff of verified contracts
* Create an NFT balance checker React hook using RainbowKit & wagmi
Create an NFT balance checker React hook using RainbowKit & wagmi
Security
* Lodestar Finance on Arbitrum $5.8 million exploit via price oracle manipulation
Lodestar Finance on Arbitrum $5.8 million exploit via price oracle manipulation
* SushiSwap Kashi vulnerability disclosed , pools could be drained via outdated
exchange rate
SushiSwap Kashi vulnerability disclosed , pools could be drained via outdated exchange
rate
Ecosystem
* KZG ceremony grants round (for EIP4844) to develop an implementation or perform weird
entropy generation & destruction
KZG ceremony grants round (for EIP4844) to develop an implementation or perform weird
* ETHIndia (ETHGlobal) finalists
ETHIndia (ETHGlobal) finalists
Enterprise
* VMware Blockchain for Ethereum Beta 1 release
VMware Blockchain for Ethereum Beta 1 release
* PayPal integrated with MetaMask mobile app to allow US users to buy ETH
PayPal integrated with MetaMask mobile app to allow US users to buy ETH
Application layer
* PartyBid (crowdfund NFT purchases) adds membership NFTs for group actions on
purchases
PartyBid (crowdfund NFT purchases) adds membership NFTs for group actions on purchases
* KnifeGame PvP game, spy & knife prices determined by a VRGDA curve
KnifeGame PvP game, spy & knife prices determined by a VRGDA curve
* Santa.fm : on-chain white elephant NFT gift exchange
Santa.fm : on-chain white elephant NFT gift exchange
* Optimism’s AttestationStation : reputation contract live
Optimism’s AttestationStation : reputation contract live
Job Listings
* Backend Engineers wanted by Alchemy to bring web3 to 1 billion people.
Backend Engineers wanted by Alchemy to bring web3 to 1 billion people.
* Ethereum Foundation seek a generalist ecosystem developer
Ethereum Foundation seek a generalist ecosystem developer
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable in ETH/DAI/USDC to
abcoathup.eth on mainnet or Layer 2. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* SBF & FTX: SBF arrested with fraud charges by US Attorney , CFTC & SEC Bloomberg, Dow
Jones, NYT & FT objected to redaction of customer info from bankruptcy filing
SBF & FTX:
* SBF arrested with fraud charges by US Attorney , CFTC & SEC
SBF arrested with fraud charges by US Attorney , CFTC & SEC
* Bloomberg, Dow Jones, NYT & FT objected to redaction of customer info from bankruptcy
filing
Bloomberg, Dow Jones, NYT & FT objected to redaction of customer info from bankruptcy
* Reuters: US Justice Department split over charging Binance . [Binance denies ]
Reuters: US Justice Department split over charging Binance . [Binance denies ]
* Coinbase ERC20 recovery tool for deposited unsupported tokens
Coinbase ERC20 recovery tool for deposited unsupported tokens
* Compound DAO sued as general partnership in frivolous lawsuit
Compound DAO sued as general partnership in frivolous lawsuit
* Donald Trump sells $4.5m of NFTs on Polygon
Donald Trump sells $4.5m of NFTs on Polygon
* Polynya: Total Addressable Market for decentralized apps isn’t that high in terms of
blockspace
Polynya: Total Addressable Market for decentralized apps isn’t that high in terms of
General
* Proposal for SNARKed Merkle Sum Tree , a Proof-of-Solvency protocol
Proposal for SNARKed Merkle Sum Tree , a Proof-of-Solvency protocol
* Gemini vendor data leak of email addresses and partial phone numbers
Gemini vendor data leak of email addresses and partial phone numbers
* COVID-bit : electromagnetic waves transmit data over 2 meters from an air-gapped
computer
COVID-bit : electromagnetic waves transmit data over 2 meters from an air-gapped
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
Permalink for this week’s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-december-17-2022
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Dec 20 – Attitudes to staking survey deadline
Dec 20 – Attitudes to staking survey deadline
* Jan 8 – Solidity developer survey deadline
Jan 8 – Solidity developer survey deadline
* Jan 17-31 – Gitcoin grants round
Jan 17-31 – Gitcoin grants round
* Jan 31 – KZG ceremony grants round deadline
Jan 31 – KZG ceremony grants round deadline
* Mar 2-5 – ETHDenver
Mar 2-5 – ETHDenver
* Mar 15-16 – ETHDubai
Mar 15-16 – ETHDubai
* Apr 3-6 – Edcon Vienna
Apr 3-6 – Edcon Vienna
* Apr 12-14 – NFT NYC
Apr 12-14 – NFT NYC
Sign up to receive this newsletter weekly
Week in Ethereum News
